tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE NLP_tasks (
    task_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    task_name VARCHAR(255),
    task_description TEXT,
    task_status ENUM('open', 'in progress', 'completed'),
    created_at TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE NLP_Annotations (
    annotation_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    annotation_type TEXT,
    start_offset INT,
    end_offset INT,
    token_id UUID REFERENCES NLP_Tokens(token_id)
);

CREATE TABLE NLP_Annotations (
    annotation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    document_id INT,
    keyword_id INT,
    entity_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (document_id) REFERENCES NLP_Documents(document_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (keyword_id) REFERENCES NLP_Keywords(keyword_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (entity_id) REFERENCES NLP_Entities(entity_id)
);

CREATE TABLE entities (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    text_id INT,
    entity_type TEXT,
    entity_value TEXT,
    start_position INT,
    end_position INT
);

CREATE TABLE relationships (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    text_id INT,
    entity1_id INT,
    entity2_id INT,
    relationship TEXT
);
